```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r set up packages and data, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

sleep <- read_csv("sleep.csv")
```

```{r simplify data}
# create new data frame from sleep
sleep_simpl <- sleep %>% 
  na.omit()
```

```{r sample graph}
dream <- ggplot(sleep_simpl, aes(x = nondream, y = dream)) +
  geom_point()

dream
```
